mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM an_imc_inspection_task as task , an_imc_user_task as userTask WHERE 1=1 AND userTask.user_id = #{userId} AND task.id = userTask.task_id

SELECT
FROM an_imc_inspection_task as task , an_imc_user_task as userTask WHERE 1=1 AND userTask.user_id = #{userId} AND task.id = userTask.task_id AND task.task_name like #{taskName}

SELECT
FROM an_imc_inspection_task as task , an_imc_user_task as userTask WHERE 1=1 AND userTask.user_id = #{userId} AND task.id = userTask.task_id AND task.status = #{status}

SELECT
FROM an_imc_inspection_task as task , an_imc_user_task as userTask WHERE 1=1 AND userTask.user_id = #{userId} AND task.id = userTask.task_id AND task.status = #{status} AND task.task_name like #{taskName}

SELECT
FROM an_imc_inspection_task as task , an_imc_facilitator_manager_task as facilitatorManagerTask WHERE 1=1 AND facilitatorManagerTask.facilitator_manager_id = #{facilitatorManagerId} AND task.id = facilitatorManagerTask.task_id

SELECT
FROM an_imc_inspection_task as task , an_imc_facilitator_manager_task as facilitatorManagerTask WHERE 1=1 AND facilitatorManagerTask.facilitator_manager_id = #{facilitatorManagerId} AND task.id = facilitatorManagerTask.task_id AND task.task_name like #{taskName}

SELECT
FROM an_imc_inspection_task as task , an_imc_facilitator_manager_task as facilitatorManagerTask WHERE 1=1 AND facilitatorManagerTask.facilitator_manager_id = #{facilitatorManagerId} AND task.id = facilitatorManagerTask.task_id AND task.status = #{status}

SELECT
FROM an_imc_inspection_task as task , an_imc_facilitator_group_task as facilitatorGroupTask WHERE 1=1 AND facilitatorGroupTask.facilitator_group_id = #{facilitatorGroupId} AND task.id = facilitatorGroupTask.task_id

SELECT
FROM an_imc_inspection_task as task , an_imc_facilitator_group_task as facilitatorGroupTask WHERE 1=1 AND facilitatorGroupTask.facilitator_group_id = #{facilitatorGroupId} AND task.id = facilitatorGroupTask.task_id AND task.task_name like #{taskName}

SELECT
FROM an_imc_inspection_task as task , an_imc_facilitator_group_task as facilitatorGroupTask WHERE 1=1 AND facilitatorGroupTask.facilitator_group_id = #{facilitatorGroupId} AND task.id = facilitatorGroupTask.task_id AND task.status = #{status}
